direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve processing and comparing attribute data, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods process attribute data but perform different operations (comparison vs. decoding).
Both methods involve accessing or modifying the connectionIdValue, which is central to the attribute's state.

enhanced_by.reason: Setting the connectionIdValue is necessary to prepare the object state for comparison in the equals method.
Decoding the attribute body is required to set up the connectionIdValue before comparison.
Both methods handle attribute data and can be used to verify the correctness of the attribute's state after comparison.
